text: White Heat is a 1949 American crime thriller movie. It was directed by Raoul Walsh. The movie is based on the story of the same name by Virginia Kellogg. It stars James Cagey, Virginia Mayo, Edmond O'Brien, Steve Cochran, Margaret Wycherly, and Wally Cassell. It was distributed by Warner Bros. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1950. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 crime movies Category:1949 thriller movies Category:1940s American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Raoul Walsh Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Illinois
title: White Heat
